calcDateFromTimestamp.description: converts string timestamp to %Y-%m-%d formatted string date

checkTableExists.description: ping database to validate if table exists in the defined schema (connection)

createTable.description: execute sql to generate table (table_name) in database (datebase_name) with the specifications defined (column_dict)

fetchDBDetails.description: source database connection details from system variable

fetchMetrics.description: execute request to metric fields endpoint

fetchMetricsDetail.description: source metrics for given metric (field) with defined specifications

fillOrder.description: helper method used to calculate how an order would be filled across the top of the order book versus multiple price levels

getBalance.description: source current account balance at a currency level

getBestPrice.description: calculate the estimated market order price based on the best available trade in the order book *accounts for Kraken transaction cost*

getOrderBook.description: source current order book for a given currency pair

getTradablePairs.description: source all tradable pairs and tradability parameters

getTradeBalance.description: source current account measures, this includes but is not limited to total trade balance, free margin, float valuation, etc.

getTradeHistory.description: source log of historically executed transactions

insert.description: execute sql to insert input entry records to target table

loanAPIKey.description: load Kraken API key from environment variables

placeOrder.description: send specified order details to execute a trade in Kraken (method validates specific trade specifications)

read_sql.description: execute and return dateframe from the request of the sql query (sql_code)

trigger.description: generalized method for executing Kraken API commands
